TestGroupDocumentation.Title: maxInclusive4 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a maxInclusive-4.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a short restricted SimpleType with maxInclusive value -20692.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxInclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxInclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value -32768 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxInclusive-4 element, sets the values: -20692, -20792, -32768 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxInclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxInclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value -32768 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxInclusive-4 element, sets the values: -20691, 0, 20692, 32767 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxInclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxInclusive-4 type, sets the values: -20692, -20792, -32768 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxInclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxInclusive-4 type, sets the values: -20691, 0, 20692, 32767 and expects validation to fail.
